name: MegaThirst
description:
A stunning, full of spectacular adventure game, fantastic ultra realistic graphics and physic.

You can play as FISH (wow)

This is the game we have been working on for the Unreal MeagaJam2020

It has been a big struggle to manage this jam and full time job, we did not finish the game sadly but it is a good proof of a concept

How to play:

Use both mouse clicks and mouse movement to move your character's hands. Reach the delicious coconut drink at the end

All of the assets except from water are made from scratch: Graphics, music, sounds and VFX
